column4: エリー＿ちょっとした驚き

/pさん、本当に
本戦まで進んだんですね。
column5: You really managed to advance to the main event, /p.
column11: /p, you really managed to advance to the main event.

column4:
私の分まで
がんばってください。
column5: Please try your best for both of us.
column11: Please try your best for the both of us.

column4:
くそっ！
ちょっとしたミスで
負けちまった。
column5:
Curses!
I only missed out by a tiny bit.
column11:
Curses!
I only missed out by a tiny bit.

column4:
/pがんばれよ。
幸運を祈ってる。
column5: Good luck, /p. I'll be cheering for you.
column11: Good luck, /p. I'll be cheering for you.

column4: フィン・ディー＿司会（叫び）
いよいよ本戦を開始します。
column5: The main event is finally about to begin.
column11: The main event is finally about to begin.

column4: フィン・ディー＿司会（興奮）

今年は、
驚くべき結果がでました。
column5: We've had some surprising results this year.
column11: This year, we've had some surprising results.

column4:
なんと本戦に、二人も
子供が出場してるのです。
column5: Amazingly, two children will be participating in today's event!
column11: Amazingly, two children will be participating in today's event.

column4:
もしどちらかが優勝すること
になれば、グランプリ始まって
以来の大事件となるでしょう。
column5:
If one of them can win the champion-
ship, it'll be the biggest event in the history of the Grand Prix.
column11: If one of them are able to win the championship, it'll be the biggest event I the history of the Grand Prix.

column4: フィン・ディー＿司会（叫び）
それでは、コースを説明します。
column5: Well then, time for me to explain the course.
column11: And as usual, it's time for me to explain the course.

column4:
サーキットを回って、
ここに戻ってくると１周。
５周すればゴールです。
column5: Race around the circuit, and return to this starting line to complete one lap. Your goal is to make five laps.
column11: Race around the circuit, and return to this starting line to complete 1 lap. Your goal is to make 5 laps.

column4: フィン・ディー＿司会（興奮）

それでは、
レーススタートです！！

オレは伝説になる。
このグランプリで優勝して。
column5: I will become a legend, the champion of the Grand Prix.
column11: I will become a legend, the champion of the Grand Prix.

column4:
だが、そのためには、
倒すべき相手がいる。
column5: But to become so, there's someone I have to beat first...
column11: But, in order to become so, there is someone I have to beat first.

column4:
/p！
決着をつけるには、
最高の舞台だ。
column5:
/p!
There could be no greater stage upon which to settle our score!
column11:
/p!
There could be no greater stage to settle things between us.
